titleStmt.title: A continuation of the last occurrences from Irland [sic], or, The copie of a letter sent from Lievtenant Haward, to Mr. Walter Fitz-Williams Esquire, lying neere the privie garden in White-Hall. Dated at Duncannon fort in Jreland, March 29. 1642. Both good and true.
titleStmt.author: Haward, Lazarus.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
